ItemTooltips.stout_shield: Strong defensive start with items you'll need later.
ItemTooltips.sobi_mask: You can choose to turn this into a medallion (for synergy with your snot) or just keep it for a little extra regen.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Virtually mandatory. You're gonna get spammed on.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Very situational. If you're running around ganking, maybe. Generally Bristle opens and tanks, rather than ganking. He need time to stack up his snots and quills.
ItemTooltips.assault: More anti-armor, but quite a luxury.
ItemTooltips.heart: Don't get a heart. You need to take hits continuously to be effective.
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: Your job is to get hit. This'll make em pay for it.
ItemTooltips.radiance: You'd have to be doing pretty well to get a rad.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: I would only go mana boots if there are other highly mana-dependant heroes on your team who aren't planning to get said boots themselves.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: Even less armor, even more snot.

AbilityTooltips.bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo: Starting with goo, or any defensive skill, is usually a good idea.
AbilityTooltips.bristleback_bristleback: No need to go early bristleback, as taking damage in lane phase is hardly a priority.
